name: Build a Wall (LeKa12)
description:
Probably the shortest Horror game in Itch.io.

Turn up your volume for better experience.

DISCLAIMER This game contains jumpscares that may be scary.

DISCLAIMER 2 This game is just made for fun and is not supposed to take seriously. Every sound belong to their respectful owners.

I also don't know if the game works properly on mac, but it might!
